cleaning

Module contents

This module aims at providing function to clean and archive unused dashboard and cards.

Submodules

cleaning.archiving module

cleaning.archiving.archiving_unused_cards(conn, freshness_in_month: int)[source]

Archiving cards that were not looked at in the last months both through dashboard or direct observation.

Parameters:

  • conn (psycopg2 DBAPI2 connector) – Connexion to your Metabase Database

  • freshness_in_month (int) – The minimal last seen period in month required for a card not to be archived as considered useless.

Return type:

Nothing as it has been build to change the Metabase DB synchronously.

cleaning.archiving.archiving_unused_dashboards(conn, freshness_in_month)[source]

Archiving dashboards that were not looked at once in the last months.

Parameters:

  • conn (psycopg2 DBAPI2 connector) – Connexion to your Metabase Database

  • freshness_in_month (int) – The minimal last seen period in month required for a card not to be archived as considered useless.

Return type:

Nothing as it has been build to change the Metabase DB synchronously.
